name: Ablative Coating
description: Ablative coating is designed to chip away when impacted, redirecting the energy of incoming projectiles away from the body.
feature: Resistance to piercing damage.

name: Adrenaline Regulator
description: Biofeedback system regulating wearer's adrenaline surges.
feature: When you roll a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack you make with a melee weapon, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll, even if the new roll is a 1 or a 2.

name: Amplifier Plates
description: Includes an internal micro-control system to maximize resources.
feature: +1 bonus to spell damage rolls

name: Archon AI
description: An efficiency algorithm to balance processing power for biotic amps and omni-tools. A heads-up display and voice command software allows users to micromanage the systems, reducing the cooldown period between energy expenditures.
feature: You can regain one 1st-level spell slot or one tech point as an action. You can’t use this property again until you finish a long rest.

name: Asymmetric Defense Layer
description: Offering increased protection where it's needed most, Rosenkov Materials' proprietary coating process increases stopping power of standard ceramic armor.
feature: +2 AC

name: Autogel
description: Microprocessors in this interface monitor vital functions and release small localized doses of medi-gel to accelerate the healing process. Manually timed heavy doses of medi-gel can be released in response to major trauma.
feature: When you lose hit points, as a reaction, you may expend a charge of medi-gel.

name: Autogel
description: Microprocessors in this interface monitor vital functions and release small localized doses of medi-gel to accelerate the healing process. Manually timed heavy doses of medi-gel can be released in response to major trauma.
feature: When you lose hit points, as a reaction, you may expend a charge of medi-gel.

name: Auxiliary Shield Emitters
description: Micro-capacitors that release energy to speed up shield regeneration.
feature: Increase your shield regen by 5.

name: Auxiliary Shield Emitters
description: Micro-capacitors that release energy to speed up shield regeneration.
feature: Increase your shield regen by 5.

name: Auxiliary Shield Emitters
description: Micro-capacitors that release energy to speed up shield regeneration.
feature: Increase your shield regen by 5.

name: Back Holster
description: A back holster designed to hold a larger weapon.
feature: Choose Assault Rifle, Shotgun, Sniper Rifle or Melee weapon. Gain an additional weapon slot for that specific weapon type. If using the Variant: Encumbrance rule, increase your Carry Weight by 10.

name: Barrier
description: Eezo oscillator provides a biotic-like barrier.
feature: The armor contains a mass effect barrier with 3 barrier ticks. You cannot use these additional barrier ticks for biotic spells, they are only for damage reduction. The barrier ticks recharge after a short rest.

name: Battle Telemetry
description: Battle telemetry systems increase the efficiency of your biotic amplifiers and omni-tool.
feature: You can regain one 1st-level spell slot or one tech point as an action. You can’t use this property again until you finish a long rest.

name: Battle Telemetry
description: Battle telemetry systems increase the efficiency of your biotic amplifiers and omni-tool.
feature: You can regain one 1st-level spell slot or one tech point as an action. You can’t use this property again until you finish a long rest.

name: Bladed Wristguards
description: Reinforce armor with razor-sharp blades that deal damage to melee attackers.
feature: When you are hit with a melee attack, deal 1d6 piercing damage back at the attacker.

name: Ceramic Weave
description: Elite personal protection equipment includes a series of interlocking ceramic plates covered in a proprietary tungsten alloy weave for maximum stopping power.
feature: +1 AC

name: Chest Holster - Grenades
description: A holster designed to hold combat grenades.
feature: Increase your grenade capacity by 4

name: Chest Holster - Thermal Clips
description: A holster designed to hold thermal clips.
feature: Increase your thermal clip capacity by 8

name: Cleats
description: Copper microfilaments in your boots ground you and abate electrical shock.
feature: Resistance to lightning.

name: Energized Plating
description: A prototype upgrade designed specifically for heavy combat use, it provides maximum protection for the user
feature: +3 AC

name: Environmental Regulators
description: Temperature controls use liquid nitrogen and plasma to keep your suit at a constant temperature.
feature: Resistance to fire and cold damage.

name: ER Jetpack
description: An advanced jetpack that can be used for longer than the standard version, but takes longer to recharge.
feature: As a bonus action, activate the jetpack to gain flying 6m for 10 minutes. This device cannot be used again until you finish a long rest.

name: Focus Modulator
description: Your headwear filters out distracting movement and sounds from sources other than your target.
feature: As a bonus action, you choose a creature you can see within 30m. For the next minute, you deal an extra 1d6 damage to the target whenever you hit it with a weapon attack, and you have advantage on any Wisdom (Perception) or Wisdom (Survival) check you make to find it. You can use this feature 3 times per long rest.

name: Hardened Weave
description: A complex filament network of element zero microcores combined with advanced firewall technology provides protection against both biotic and tech attacks.
feature: Resistance to cold, fire, force, lightning, and necrotic damage types.

name: Hip Caddy - Grenades
description: A simple device designed to hold combat grenades.
feature: Increase your grenade capacity by 2

name: Hip Caddy - Thermal Clips
description: A simple device designed to hold additional thermal clips.
feature: Increase your thermal clip capacity by 4.

name: Hip Holster
description: An additional hip holster designed to hold a small weapon.
feature: Choose Heavy Pistol, SMG, or Melee weapon with a Min STR score of 11 or less. Gain an additional weapon slot for that specific weapon type. If using the Variant: Encumbrance rule, increase your Carry Weight by 5.

name: Jetpack
description: This propulsion device generates mass effect fields for lift and gyroscopic atitude adjusters to maneuver the wearer for a short duration.
feature: As a bonus action, activate the jetpack to gain flying 6m for 1 minute. This device cannot be used again until you finish a short rest.

name: Jump Jets
description: Quickly compresses the atmosphere and ejects it from boosters built into the soles of the boots, allowing for longer jumps and brief hovering.
feature: Your jump distance is tripled. If you jump straight up, you can hover at the apex of your jump for 1 round of combat (6 sec).

name: Life Support Webbing
description: A net of micro-stimulants and medi-gel in order to increase the chances of survival for aid workers and military personnel working in hostile environments.
feature: Increases your maximum exhaustion by 1 level. At the first level, you suffer no negative effects.

name: Mag Latches
description: Powerful magnets keep you grounded.
feature: If you are standing on a metal surface, you are immune to being lifted. Otherwise, if you would make a saving throw against being lifted, you have advantage.

name: Microservos
description: Microservos coordinate your melee strikes.
feature: +1 bonus to melee attack and damage rolls

name: Microservos
description: Microservos coordinate your melee strikes.
feature: +2 bonus to melee attack and damage rolls

name: Offhand Ammo Pack
description: A simple but popular modification favored among mercenary groups and military personnel on active assignment.
feature: Increase your thermal clip capacity by 2

name: Ordinance Packs
description: Co-developed by the Rahael Group and Beckmann Financial to solve the issue of munitions storage for Heavy Weapon class engagement tools.
feature: Your heavy weapons have 2 additional charges.

name: Personal Disruptor Torpedoes
description: A "micro gravitic" personal weapon that effectively fires small disruptor torpedoes.
feature: Choose a target location within 30m. Creatures within a 4m sphere of the target must make a dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 3d12 force damage, or have as much damage on a successful one. You must finish a short rest, allowing the weapon to recharge before using it again.

name: QR Jetpack
description: A better model of the standard jetpack that has a larger batter reserve, allowing for more uses before recharging.
feature: As a bonus action, activate the jetpack to gain flying 6m for 1 minute. You may use this 3 times per short rest.

name: Recharge Capacitor
description: Micro wells store part of the energy directed at the armor and use it to jump start the kinetic barrier recharge cycle.
feature: Once per short rest, as a reaction to taking damage, you may jumpstart your shield regen and immediately gain shield points equal to your regen amount.

name: Recharge Capacitor
description: Micro wells store part of the energy directed at the armor and use it to jump start the kinetic barrier recharge cycle.
feature: Once per short rest, as a reaction to taking damage, you may jumpstart your shield regen and immediately gain shield points equal to your regen amount.

name: Revive AI
description: This AI monitors your vitals and attempts to stabilize you if become incapacitated.
feature: If you fall below 0 hit points you immediately become stabilized. If you have any medi-gel left, you may expend one to gain hit points.

name: Savant Biotic Amp
description: One of the most powerful biotic amps on the market. Serrice Council amps are incredibly rare—and highly prized—items on the galactic market.
feature: When you roll a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack you make with a biotic spell, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll, even if the new roll is a 1 or a 2.

name: Sentry System
description: A software application that optimizes an armor suit's microframe computer. When the Sentry system is running, more power can be devoted to shield management.
feature: Increase your shield points by 5.

name: Shield Battery
description: An increased shield battery for your kinetic barrier.
feature: Increase your shield points by 5.

name: Shield Capacity
description: Micro-harmonic oscillators to reduce stress on the kinetic barriers ensuring suit integrity when faced with incoming projectiles.
feature: Increase your shield points by 5.

name: Shield Interface
description: Advanced VI systems monitor incoming enemy fire to redirect energy to vulnerable points, maximizing the effectiveness of a suit's kinetic barrier shields.
feature: Increase your shield points by 15.

name: Shield Modulator
description: A series of ultra-efficient storage cells augment the existing power in the operation of the wearer's kinetic barrier.
feature: Increase your shield points by 10.

name: Shock absorbers
description: Made for explosive mining on asteroids, these shock absorbers distribute energy from powerful blasts, reducing damage to the wearer.
feature: Resistance to thunder.

name: Stimulator Conduits
description: Incorporates a series of beryllium and tungsten braces and micro-servos to support and enhance the natural movements of the wearer for short periods of time.
feature: Increase your speed by 6m.

name: Teflon Coating
description: A spray of teflon that reflects mutliple types of radiation.
feature: Resistance to radiant damage.

name: Thermal Armor
description: Heat regulators keep your armor warm in the coldest environments.
feature: You are immune to being frozen.

name: Toxic Resistance
description: Specially-sealed body armor and biotoxin blood filters provide increased protection against radiation, gases, and a host of other toxins.
feature: Resistance to acid and poison damage. You have advantage on Constitution saving throws that would cause you to be poisoned.

name: Umbra AI
description: By detecting the focal point of the wearer's eyes and enhancing the image at that location, the visor helps direct a biotic power or a shot from an omni-tool exactly where the wearer is looking.
feature: When you roll a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack you make with a tech power, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll, even if the new roll is a 1 or a 2.

name: Voice Modulator
description: Includes an advanced audio processing package that allows unprecedented clarity and resonance for spoken communication.
feature: +2 to Persuasion and Intimidation checks

name: Enviro-Systems
description: An activatible hermetic seal against vacuum or underwater pressure. While most armors act as space-suits, they aren't necessarily graded for more than a few hours of vacuum exposure, nor are they graded for underwater performance where water pressure can be crushing.
feature: As a free action, you gain Water Breathing and the ability to breathe indefinitely in zero-oxygen environments for the next 24 hours. If you are not wearing a helmet, the suit creates a hard light helment that equalizes preassure around your head.

name: Echo Cancel
description: Specifically attuned mass effect fields in your armor's boots that are keyed to sound waves.
feature: Your footsteps make no noise and you have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks that rely on remaining silent.

name: Night Sight
description: A standard night-vision mod issued to infantry across the galaxy.
feature: Your optic sensors now have darkvision out to a range of 60m. If you already have darkvision, activating this program increases its range by 60m.

name: Reactive Kinetic Compensator
description: A vi-response program that generates a burst of hard light between the layers of the user's armor to reduce trauma from otherwise-lethal hits.
feature: Any critical hit against you becomes a normal hit.

name: Zoom Enhance
description: Fine-tuned lenses that fit over your armor's optics, enhancing your ability to see minute details.
feature: You have advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) checks that rely on sight while searching an area or studying an object within a range of 2m.
